    • Class demo.SuperPigsExample

      class SuperPigsExample extends GameBase implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • charm
          AttachedElement charm
          Charm that may occasionally appear...
        • charmCounter
          int charmCounter
          Counter to let a number of frames elapse before adding/removing charm.
        • currentPlatform
          AbstractElement currentPlatform
          Track the current platform, so we don't generate new enemies on it.
        • elevators
          ArrayList<LiftElement> elevators
          List of platforms
        • enemyRenderer
          Renderer enemyRenderer
          Create this once, since we need it a lot.
        • explosions
          ArrayList<VanishingElement> explosions
          List of explosions
        • leftArrow
          int leftArrow
          Count of number of frames left arrow key has been held down, to potentially speed up player.
        • over
          boolean over
          Stop timer when game is over.
        • platforms
          ArrayList<PlatformElement> platforms
          List of platforms
        • player
          FlyingElement player
          The player
        • princess
          FlyingElement princess
          The princess!
        • princessPaused
          boolean princessPaused
          When we get a charm, pause the tower for a couple of seconds.
        • princessRenderer
          ImageRenderer princessRenderer
          Renderer for princess, so we can change direction.
        • princessSpeed
          double princessSpeed
          Initial speed of princess and tower.
        • rand
          Random rand
          Generator for random positions.
        • renderer
          ImageRenderer renderer
          Renderer for player, so we can change player's direction.
        • rightArrow
          int rightArrow
          Count of number of frames right arrow key has been held down, to potentially speed up player.
        • score
          int score
          Current score for the game.
        • tower
          MovingElement tower
          Tower for the princess

    • Class demo.WhenPigsFly

      class WhenPigsFly extends GameBase implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • appleRenderer
          Renderer appleRenderer
          Renderer for the apples.
        • apples
          ArrayList<MovingElement> apples
          List of "enemies" that will fall from the sky.
        • appleSpeed
          double appleSpeed
          Vertical velocity for apples.
        • explosions
          ArrayList<VanishingElement> explosions
          List of active explosions for when we land on an apple.
        • maxApples
          int maxApples
          If number of apples goes below this value, make some more.
        • minApples
          int minApples
          Initial number of apples.
        • mouseX
          int mouseX
          Track mouse position so player can follow it.
        • platform
          SimpleElement platform
          Platform at bottom of the screen.
        • player
          FlyingElement player
          The player.
        • playerFlipped
          boolean playerFlipped
          Keep track of player's orientation to match direction of motion.
        • rand
          Random rand
          Generator for random positins.
        • renderer
          ImageRenderer renderer
          Renderer for the player.
        • score
          int score
          Keep score.
